text-align: left;
div.span: We can see that this activity diagram corresponds to the language switching function of our program.

div.style: text-align: left;
div.span: Indeed we can see that as soon as the function is started, the user is asked to choose between 2 languages.
Depending on the user's response, the software language will be changed or not.

switch.text: We can see that this activity diagram corresponds to the language...
